content: of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 6 b setup with rs facing and mc row 1a rs *knit mc stitch from working needle slip next cc stitch from back needle wyif purl the next mc stitch slip next cc stitch from back needle wyif repeat across to the last 2 stitches slip last mc wyib and cc stitch wyif do not turn the work slide all stitches back to the other end of the needle with cc row 1b rs *slip mc stitch wyib purl next cc stitch slip next mc stitch wyib knit next cc stitch repeat across to the last stitch slip the last cc stitch wyif turn work you have now completed 1 full rs double-knit row with ws facing and mc row 2a ws *p mc stitch slip cc stitch wyib knit next mc stitch slip next cc stitch wyib repeat from * across to the last mc stitch slip last mc stitch wyib slide stitches back to the other end of the needle crossing yarns at the edge row 2b ws *slip mc stitch wyif knit cc stitch slip next mc stitch wyif purl next cc stitch repeat across to the last cc stitch slip the last cc stitch wyif turn work you have now completed 1 full ws double-knit row c neckband work the neckline in two-colour double knit in total 8 rs row or 4cm buttonhole 1 on rs row 4 of the neckband work buttonhole 1 into the left front band see section 5 c after completing the neckband continue directly into the body © 2026 qing studio ltd this pattern is for personal use only no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or sold without written permission 7 section 2 yoke the yoke is worked flat with front bands continuing uninterrupted at both edges all shaping occurs only across the centre yoke stitches front bands are worked straight in double knit throughout a place markers with rs facing with 4 5 mm needles and mc work 8 sts in two-colour double knit as established for the front bands across the next 63 yoke stitches work half-brioche stitch by working 1 stitch from mc together with 1 stitch from cc setup row 1a rs with mc *k1 sl1 wyif p1 sl1 wyif repeat from *3 more times pm k2tog sl2yo x2 k2tog pm sl2yo k2tog x2 sl2yo pm k2tog sl2yo x4 k2tog pm sl2yo k2tog x2 sl2yo pm k2tog sl2yo x7 k2tog pm sl2yo k2tog x2 sl2yo pm k2tog sl2yo x4 k2tog pm sl2yo k2tog x2 sl2yo pm k2tog sl2yo x2 k2tog pm *p1 sl1 wyif k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to the last 2 sts sl1 wyib sl1 wyif setup row 1b rs with cc *sl1 wyib p1 sl1 wyib k1 repeat from *3 more times k1 brp3tog to the band last 16 sts *sl1 wyib k1 sl1 wyib p1 to the last 2 sts sl1 wyib sl1 wyif setup row 2a ws
